data.title: Kay Kay Menon: Articles, Photos, Videos & More
data.meta_description: Kay Kay Menon - Check out latest updates, news, articles, photos, videos, stats, history, and more information about Kay Kay Menon exclusively on MensXP.
data.text:
In an interview after Bigg Boss OTT 3 came to an end with Sana Makbul winning the trophy, second runner up Ranvir Shorey calls her an ‘undeserving winner’. She hits back by calling him a ‘male chauvinist’.

The teaser of the highly anticipated upcoming show Citadel: Honey Bunny has finally dropped online. Starring Varun Dhawan, Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Kay Kay Menon, Citadel: Honey Bunny is produced by Russo Brothers and streams on Amazon Prime Video from November 7, 2024.

Actor Babil Khan got massively trolled recently. Here is how he chose to strike back at the trolls on the internet who called him ‘pretentious’.

As Siddharth Anand recently confirmed Krrish 4, fans named these 8 actors perfect to play a villain opposite Hrithik Roshan in Krrish 4 like Tiger Shroff, Bobby Deol and more.

The Indian OTT space has boomed in the last few years with Bollywood stars making their web debut. Here are 10 best shows on Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Disney+ Hotstar featuring Bollywood stars.

There have been many Bollywood films in which the audiences have sided with villains, either for a cause or a motive. Here are eight Bollywood films in which the villains were actually right.

Thor: Ragnarok director Taika Waititi in a recent interview revealed his two favourite Indian films - Satyajit Ray’s Pather Panchali (1955) and Remo D’Souza’s ABCD-Any Body Can Dance (2015).

Yash Raj Films has ventured into the OTT realm with their latest project, 'The Railway Men,' featuring Kay Kay Menon, R. Madhavan, Divyendu, and Babil Khan in key roles. The series revolves around railway workers who played a crucial role in rescuing lives during the Bhopal Gas Tragedy, recognized as the most devastating industrial disaster globally. This tragic event transpired on the night of December 2, 1984, at the Union Carbide India Limited (UCIL) pesticide plant in Bhopal.

The Railway Men is getting amazing reactions from audiences and in a recent roundtable with the cast, Babil Khan talked about his emotional connection with Kay Kay Menon and why he didn't feel like not having a father during The Railway Men shoot.

YRF’s first web series The Railway Men starring R Madhavan, Kay Kay Menon, Divyendu and Babil Khan is a thrilling, inspiring and a heart-breaking watch. Here are 8 similar films and shows that should be on your watchlist if you liked The Railway Men.

Yash Raj Films’ first foray into OTT space is an highly ambitious web series titled The Railway Men starring R Madhavan, Kay Kay Menon, Divyenndu, Babil Khan and Juhi Chawla. The 4-episode show will stream on Netflix from November 18. Watch The Railway Men trailer.

Bambai Meri Jaan is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language period crime thriller web series produced under the banner of Excel Entertainment. The series stars Kay Kay Menon, Avinash Tiwary, Kritika Kamra, Nivedita Bhattacharya and Amyra Dastur. It was premiered on Amazon Prime Video. The Source Material of this Series is adopted from the book Dongri To Dubai: Six Decades of the Mumbai Mafia. The story is based on charector of Dara Kadri who is the son of a Police Man named Ismail Kadri.

The much awaited trailer for Farhan Akhtar’s series Bambai Meri Jaan has been released and is getting mixed reactions from fans. Many people are appreciating the trailer for its cast and gritty backdrop, while many others are labelling it as ‘just another gangster glorification’. Check out some interesting reactions.

The Bollywood film industry inhabits all sorts of actors and actresses. Some who are insanely talented and popular and others who have only one of the two. Here's a list of all the actors that fans believe to have great talent but not enough popularity.

this article talks about director ankush bhatt who has recently accused anurag kashyap of copying the climax of his film ‘gangs of wasseypur’ from ‘bhindi bazaar’.

There have been some villains in Bollywood which have become iconic through the ages. Here, we are discussing the things that made them eminent and the recipe for a perfect villain.

From Shahid Kapoor's Bloody Daddy teaser, the first look at his rom-com with Kriti Sanon and Shah Rukh Khan's Dunki to announcements of Stree 2 and Bhediya 2 expanding the Horror-Comedy Universe, take a look at Jio Studios' 100 films and shows in a new teaser video.

Learn entrepreneurship, leadership, strategy and negotiation by watching these super interesting and equally dramatic Indian shows and movies.

Kapil Sharma is getting appreciation for his portrayal of a delivery boy in Zwigato and with his acting and comedy skills, he has surpassed the legendary comedian Johny Lever and here’s how.

this article talks about a list of underrated Bollywood movies which were made under a budget of rs 8 crores. List includes titles like Firaaq and Ugly.

Farzi is a 2023 Hindi-language black comedy crime thriller web series about counterfeit money created, produced and directed by Raj & DK, who also co-wrote the series with Sita Menon and Suman Kumar. Farzi web series stars Shahid Kapoor, Vijay Sethupathi, Kay Kay Menon, Raashii Khanna and Bhuvan Arora, and is streaming on Amazon Prime Video.

R Madhavan’s new selfie has taken the internet by storm, beating the record of his famous shower selfie on Instagram as fans go crazy.

this article talks about espionage thrillers like aditya roy kapur and anil kapoor’s ‘the night manager’. List includes titles like the family man and the bard of blood.

'Farzi' is one of the latest TV shows to be aired on Prime Video and has received a lot of positive reviews from the fans. Here's a look at the fees that was charged by the cast of Farzi, which includes Shahid Kapoor, Vijay Sethupathi, Raashi Khanna and Kay Kay Menon.

Shahid Kapoor, Vijay Sethupathi, Raashi Khanna & Kay Kay Menon’s web series Farzi is set in the same universe as Manoj Bajpayee & Priyamani starrer The Family Man. Here are 5 interesting connections between Farzi & The Family Man as Raj & DK’s Spy Universe is officially here.

this article talks about the fees charged by ‘farzi’ star cast, including shahid kapoor, raashi khanna and vijay sethupathi. The show is currently running on prime video, and is directed by raj & DK.

Shahid Kapoor and Vijay Sethupathi starrer 'Farzi' released on Amazon Prime Video yesterday. However, Vijay's performance in the show was 'disappointing and expressionless'.

Shahid Kapoor serves major style goals in a quirky grey bandhgala that features a cropped jacket at the screening of his OTT debut series Farzi.

Fans have reacted to the release date by expressing their fear of terrible song remakes, their expectations of banger music composed by Pritam, and their longing for KK's euphony. However, Irrfan Khan's absence appears to have hit Twitterati the hardest.

this article talks about new OTT releases in February 2023 on netflix, prime video, Disney+hostar and zee5.

Shahid Kapoor attended the trailer launch of his upcoming film Farzi wearing a super cool blazer jacket that features strategic zip detailing.

Shahid Kapoor is making his OTT debut with the web series Farzi, releasing on Amazon Prime Video. The actor has turned into an artist as he shared its teaser yesterday.

In an interview, Abhishek Bachchan talked about his 2008 superhero film Drona & listed down four people who actually loved the film. Besides himself, director Goldie Behl & film critic Bardawaj Rangan, Abhishek revealed that Shah Rukh Khan too had enjoyed the film quite a lot.

Here is a list of give WWE wrestlers who acted in mainstream Bollywood movies alongside famed actors like Akshay Kumar, Tiger Shroff and Raveena Tandon.

Days after the unfortunate & untimely demise of Raju Srivastav, his daughter Antara Srivastava penned an emotional note thanking Amitabh Bachchan for being there with them every single day during the time he was admitted in the hospital. She also mentioned how Raju used to consider Big B as his Guru.

From Shahid Kapoor’s ‘Farzi’ to Shefali Shah’s ‘Delhi Crime 2’, let’s take a look at the list of upcoming Indian web shows of Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Disney+Hostar & other OTT giants.

After producing Kangana Ranaut's 'Dhaakad', producer Deepak Mukut has now signed Jacqueline Fernandez for his next venture. It is going to be the biopic of veteran filmmaker-action Chetan Anand. The actress will be playing the role of Anand's partner Priya Rajvansh in the project.

Shahid Kapoor's last release 'Jersey' turned out to be a disappointing affair at the box office. However, the actor has reportedly hiked his fee for his next film despite his recent failure.

Shahid Kapoor and Mrunal Thakur's 'Jersey' was released on April 22 and received positive reviews from most of the critics. However, the film has been underperforming at the box office and turned out to be a huge flop. Interestingly, the film couldn't even cross the first-day collections of 'Kabir Singh' in week 1.

After the huge success of 'The Family Man 2', which starred Samantha Ruth Prabhu as the main antagonist, the makers of the Manoj Bajpayee-starrer series are working on the third season of the Amazon Prime Video original. Here's all you need to know.

From Aamir Khan-starrer 'Rang De Basanti' to Akshay Kumar's 'Baby', let's take a look at the list of Bollywood films that were released during the Republic Day weekend and turned out to be hit.

Shahid Kapoor, who is finally making a comeback on the big screen after the 2019 blockbuster Kabir Singh, has started the promotions of Jersey with co-star Mrunal Thakur.

this article talks about YRF’s first OTT project titled ‘the railway men’ starring babil khan, kay kay menon and r. madhavan. It is based on the Bhopal gas tragedy.

Shahid Kapoor will be one of the biggest Bollywood stars to join the OTT bandwagon with his upcoming web series, which is being directed by the creative duo of Raj & DK of the Family Man. Tamil star Vijay Sethupathi is also going to be a part of the project. Here's everything you need to know about the unnamed web series through which Shahid & Vijay will be making their OTT debuts.

Neha Bhasin is a contestant on Bigg Boss OTT. She recently opened up about being body shamed. She said in an interview she was called fat. Check out the story here.

Here is a review of Netflix's Ray by an avid reader of Satyajit Ray's stories. Here is what Ray got right, and what it messed up.

After Kay Kay Menon exceeds expectations in his role as Indrashish aka Bahrupiya in the second story that is a psychological thriller, here is a list of 5 other movies to binge after you are done with Ray.

Netflix announced an anthology, Ray, to give tribute to the great Satyajit Ray. When the trailer was released, everyone had high hopes but it all came crashing down when we finally got to watch it.

Every Ray fan has been wondering one thing ever since the trailer of Netflix's Ray released - which are the 4 original Bengali stories that are being retold here? Clearly, the names that Netflix has given - Forget Me Not, Hungama Hai Kyon Barpa, Bahrupiya, and Spotlight - are not the original nomenclatures.

The first trailer for Netflix's Ray released today and it looks like a promising tale of four men from different walks of life. Here are a few things that this Netflix Original has already got us excited about the thrilling anthology film.

Scam 1992, Paatal Lok, Panchayat, and 'Mirzapur' among others make it to the list of top 10 Indian web series in 2020 as per IMDb ratings.

Murder Mysteries and crime thrillers as genres are actually pretty great. With that being said, not all of them perform well at the box office. We list a few underrated but finely made murder mysteries that are worth watching

Although Nawazuddin Siddiqui has become a proper star now and people recognise him in an instant, there are quite a number of films in which people still fail to recognise Nawazuddin. We list a few films where Nawazuddin is playing a character, but people still dont recognise him
